paper.title: UPPAAL-Tiga: time for playing games!

author.org: LaBRI, Bordeaux-1 University, CNRS, UMR, Talence, France#TAB#
IRCCyN, École Centrale de Nantes, CNRS, UMR, Nantes, France#TAB#

paper.abstract: In 2005 we proposed the first efficient on-the-fly algorithm for solving games based on timed game automata with respect to reachability and safety properties. The first prototype presented at that time has now matured to a fully integrated tool with dramatic improvements both in terms of performance and the availability of the extended input language of UPPAAL-4.0. The new tool can output strategies or let the user play against them both from the command line and from the graphical simulator that was completely re-designed.
